description:
Traveling is stressful.  From the taxi to check-in, to security and getting to the gate in time to board the plane.  Sometimes, there aren’t enough minutes to grab a bite to eat.

B4 YOU BOARD™ is the key to making the traveler’s day better at Chicago O’Hare, Sacramento Intl. Airport, Phoenix, Salt Lake City, and Minneapolis-St. Paul International  Airports. This new app, brought to travelers by airport restaurateur HMSHost, makes it easy to dine at the airport if you’re in a rush, or just happy sitting at your gate waiting to board your plane.

Download the B4 YOU BOARD™ app and get started on making your trip easier and better.

The menus at the B4 YOU BOARD™ airports offer selections from breakfast to lunch and dinner, and even appetizers. You’ll chose from restaurants including Chili’s Too!, French Meadow Bakery & Café, Stanley’s Blackhawks Lounge, and Stefani’s Tuscany Café, to name just a few.
releaseNotes: * important bug fix that caused the app to crash when trying to order outside availability times
